TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationLockCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Contains a collection of locked configuration objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In a configuration file, a configuration section contains both attributes and elements. A ConfigurationLockCollection collection exists for the locked attributes of a configuration section, and is accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class. Another ConfigurationLockCollection collection exists for the locked elements of a configuration section, and is accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the ConfigurationLockCollection type.
[!CODE [System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the configuration object.
Docs.summary: Locks a configuration object by adding it to the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Adding a configuration object to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> collection specifies that the configuration object is locked and cannot be modified until it has been removed from the collection.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the Add method. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> class.
[!CODE [System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#3](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#3)]

Docs.summary: Gets a list of configuration objects contained in the collection.
Docs.value: A comma-delimited string that lists the lock configuration objects in the collection.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the configuration object to verify.
Docs.summary: Verifies whether a specific configuration object is locked.
Docs.returns: `true` if the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"> contains the specified configuration object; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (string[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(string[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: A one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array"> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection>. The <see cref="T:System.Array"> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in at which copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
Gets the number of locked configuration objects contained in the collection.
Docs.value: The number of locked configuration objects contained in the collection.
